file_content.text: So according to what I got, this is the last place anyone saw our bounty hunter.
"The Menace." Loser wants a piece of me just 'cause everyone else does... we'll show him what it's like to be hunted.
How do you want to handle this one?
Let's hear the plan.
We hang around until someone comes home, or until we get bored. Keep your gun out.
You're sure your information is good?
How'd you find this spot?
Pretty sure. Paid good money to a Rodian for it.
You live a bad life, you come to a bad end.
He'll get what he deserves.
You said it.
Doesn't look like anyone's home. That's okay--we can wait....
Think we got something.
Kaliyo. You haven't changed.
Do I know you?
You should.
Ona Querit. The woman you left on Ylesia? Remember?
No way... ha! You're kidding!
I take it you've met the Menace after all.
You know each other?
[Flirt] Well, hello.
Don't. You can go, but my business is with her.
Let me guess. You also have a personal vendetta here.
Kaliyo cause you trouble, too?
You want to tell me why you're hunting Kaliyo?
Explain yourself, hunter!
My business isn't with you.
She's Senator Querit's daughter. Rich brat... I showed her how to live.
You seduced me into leaving my father. Leaving Coruscant....
You got to see new places, hang with Black Sun--her dad didn't even cut off her accounts.
He thought I'd been kidnapped!
When you disappeared, I cried for a month. I couldn't go home--but on Alderaan, they'd taught me how to duel. So I became this.
You felt abandoned, so now you've decided to kill your former partner.
Now you want revenge...
I won't kill her if she doesn't fight. I'll drag her back to Coruscant for trial.
You can't tell me you were expecting this.
What do you think, Kaliyo?
I've got to say, Ona--I didn't think you had it in you.
Now you know.
Put your weapons down and surrender. I'm taking you, dead or alive.
I don't know what happened between you--but surely you can resolve this.
You two could just make up.
Well? What do you say?
I'm impressed, but I'm not apologizing.
Then we fight.
Obsessing about vengeance is pointless. You wanted to prove yourself to Kaliyo, and you have.
Don't do this, Ona.
Now let this go.
You can always change your mind, track me down later.
Get out of here.
That was fantastic. I can't believe she's still alive....
Come on. That's the last of the list, so we need to celebrate.
Come on. We're not through the list yet!
You forgot the third option.
Fair enough. [Attack]
You die first.
Well, Kaliyo--you ready to see what a "rich brat" can do?
Let's see you fight.
I'd love to see what you can do. Tell you what--you win, drinks are on me.
If I win, I'm bringing you to justice!
Now, why would you hide such a lovely face under a mask?
[Flirt] Well, hello.
